Subjects: Annunciation, songs of; Virgin Mary, Annunciation to
_description: A macaronic song of the Annunciation — sixteen 6-line stanzas

CULEe112.First Lines:
Misit deus angelumA downe fro heuen
                    blysse…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Thatt thou withowten blameHast born Ihesus by
                    name
CULEe112.Note: Not attributed to Ryman in MS.
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 313-16.
